com.netflix.spectator.atlas.impl

Class Evaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.atlas.impl.Evaluator

  • public class Evaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    Evaluates all of the expressions for subscriptions associated with a group. Classes in this package are only intended for use internally within spectator. They may change at any time and without notice.

      Constructor and Description
      Evaluator()

        public Evaluator()

    • Method Detail

      • sync

        public Evaluator sync(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Subscription>> subs)
        Synchronize the internal set of subscriptions with the map that is passed in.
        Parameters:
        subs - Complete set of subscriptions for all groups. The keys for the map are the group names.
        Returns:
        This instance for chaining of update operations.

      • addGroupSubscriptions

        public Evaluator addGroupSubscriptions(java.lang.String group,
                                       java.util.List<Subscription> subs)
        Add subscriptions for a given group.
        Parameters:
        group - Name of the group. At Netflix this is typically the cluster that includes the instance reporting data.
        subs - Set of subscriptions for the group.
        Returns:
        This instance for chaining of update operations.

      • removeGroupSubscriptions

        public Evaluator removeGroupSubscriptions(java.lang.String group)
        Remove subscriptions for a given group.
        Parameters:
        group - Name of the group. At Netflix this is typically the cluster that includes the instance reporting data.
        Returns:
        This instance for chaining of update operations.

      • eval

        public EvalPayload eval(java.lang.String group,
                        long timestamp,
                        java.util.List<TagsValuePair> vs)
        Evaluate expressions for all subscriptions associated with the specified group using the provided data.
        Parameters:
        group - Name of the group. At Netflix this is typically the cluster that includes the instance reporting data.
        timestamp - Timestamp to use for the payload response.
        vs - Set of values received for the group for the current time period.
        Returns:
        Payload that can be encoded and sent to Atlas streaming evaluation cluster.
